text: I don t knowI m   possibly even trans and I just don t know where to start  Even if I had someone who loved me or even liked me or if I had all the money in the world I just don t see the appeal of living  I just don t feel anything anymore no desire to be happy anymore  I don t feel any desire to be loved anymore  When I used to reach deep down to know what I want to do with my life and what I wanted from a relationship it was clear what I thought could make me happy  but now when I reach deep down for what I truly want it s just a deep desire to stop existing and just disappear  I almost fantasize about doing it  like it would be the best outcome for me  like it was a mistake for me to exist in the first place  I get a sick feeling every time I look in the mirror  I doubt it s possible for anyone to truly like me anyway  I have unrealistic expectations of life and relationships anyway  I ll die before I truly find someone I can be happy with  I can t exactly expect someone to like how I look when I clearly don t take care of myself  I don t even truly have the motivation to even kill myself with conventional methods maybe if I lived alone I could starve myself to death or something like that but I don t know anymore  Since I never made that many connections to people there aren t many that would be that sad for too long  The only reasons or pretty much just excuses at this point to live I have are meaningless things that only just keep my mind occupied for a time  People tell me that I ll find someone or something but that person doesn t exist  I ll just keep waiting and getting by until either I end it or I just die alone anyway  It ll be just right when it happens  like a dream  like all is right
summary: I don't see the appeal of living anymore. I don't feel any desire to be happy or to be loved. I have unrealistic expectations of life and relationships. I doubt it's possible for anyone to truly like me anyway.

text: I m not depressed anymore I m now seven months sober  my life is stable and I got away from my hometown  I have a girlfriend who is very loyal and would do anything for me  I have stable  sober friends and a loving family  My life has improved in every way  to the extent that I don t really feel depressed anymore  Here s the catch  I still want to die  Even when I m happy I think about it  I just don t see a point  My life as well as everyone else s  is ultimately pointless  Death would end any pain and anger and prevent me from future suffering  but it would also end and prevent anything  good  I m stuck in purgatory in the fact that I don t see a point in living but I can t justify dying  I get excited whenever I see something on the news about nuclear tension or a new deadly outbreak of a disease  but nothing ever comes of it  Humans are the worst  most fuckered up invasive species in known existence  We are very good at killing and causing pain  Self awareness is the worst curse anything could have put on them  I wish I had been born a cat or a tree or something
